title: Zero Trust Gateway Categories
description: Categories are a way of classifying domains and IP addresses into semantic groups. Category IDs can be matched on as part of the 'traffic' wirefilter expression in Secure Web Gateway Rules.

links.title: List Categories

id.description: The identifier for this category. There is only one category per id.

description.example: "Sites related to educational content that are not included in other categories like Science, Technology or Educational institutions."
description.description: A short summary of domains in the category.

class.description: Which account types are allowed to create policies based on this categories. `blocked` categories are blocked unconditionally for all accounts. `removalPending` categories can be removed from policies but not added. `noBlock` categories cannot be blocked.

beta.description: Whether the category is in beta and subject to change.
